org.hibernate.ogm.options.navigation.context

Interface GlobalContext<G extends GlobalContext<G,E>,E extends EntityContext<E,?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    G - the type of a provider-specific global context definition, following the self-referential generic type pattern
    E - the type of provider-specific entity context definition, associated with the specific global context type
    All Superinterfaces:
    GlobalOptions<G>

    public interface GlobalContext<G extends GlobalContext<G,E>,E extends EntityContext<E,?>>
extends GlobalOptions<G>
    Global level and entry point to the mapping API. Implementations must declare a constructor with a single parameter of type ConfigurationContext and should preferably be derived from BaseGlobalContext.
    Author:
    Emmanuel Bernard

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      E entity(Class<?> type)
      Specify mapping for the entity type
